snippet.title: [Demo] Tale of Jade / Li Guang 玉言·离光 - Gameplay / (PC)
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1537480/_/
“Tale of Jade / Li Guang” is a stand-alone roguelike card game with oriental elements.Constructing your own deck by 5 elements cards, Exploring the map, solving random encounters, beating the demon and uncovering the mystery of Li Guang’s Kingdom.
